item.title: Robosafe - Wireless Controlled Locker With Multi Factor Authentication
item.description: A versatile wireless controlled locker system built using an Arduino Mega. It offers seamless unlocking through various methods including App control, RFID card, Fingerprint. Features ğŸ”’ Wireless Control: Unlock and access the locker remotely using a dedicated mobile app. ğŸ“± Multi-factor Authentication: RFID Card: Swipe an authorized RFID card for quick access. ğŸ’³ Fingerprint: Unlock using biometric authentication for added security. ğŸ‘† Arduino Mega: Powered by the reliable Arduino Mega platform.

item.title: MrDataAnalyst Interactive Data Analysis Tool
item.description: An interactive data analysis tool that empowers users to input data, perform various data manipulation tasks, and visualize insights effortlessly. Built using Python’s Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib libraries, this tool is designed to simplify data analysis tasks. Features ğŸ“Š Data Aggregation: Summarize and aggregate data based on specified criteria. ğŸ“ˆ Data Sorting: Arrange data in ascending or descending order for better understanding. ğŸ” Data Pivoting: Transform data into pivot tables for multidimensional analysis.

item.title: CBSE Results 2023 - Automated CBSE Result Scraper
item.description: In this project, I created a Python script built using Selenium to scrape scorecards from the CBSE Results Digilocker website. It can retrieve scorecards for all 12th-grade students in a school. Features ğŸ“„ Automated Scraper: Retrieve scorecards for all 12th-grade students without manual effort. ğŸ”„ Smart Scraping: Utilize Selenium for efficient and accurate data extraction. ğŸ¤– Comprehensive Data: Obtain detailed scorecards from the CBSE Results Digilocker. ğŸ“

item.title: OnePaceStremioV2 - Dynamic Stremio Addon for One Pace
item.description: A Dynamic Stremio addon written in JavaScript using Stremio SDK that provides a better way to watch One Pace on Stremio. It uses data from One Pace obtained through a GraphQL query. Features ğŸ“º Dynamic Stremio Addon: Enhance your Stremio experience with One Pace content. ğŸ¬ Better Viewing: Enjoy One Pace content seamlessly on Stremio. ğŸš€ GraphQL Integration: Fetch One Pace data using GraphQL queries. ğŸ” Tech Stack ğŸ› ï¸ Programming: JavaScript Stremio SDK: Stremio addon development using the Stremio SDK.
